title.narrative: National Community Driven Development Project: Township Level Technical Assistance (THANINTHARYI)

description.narrative: National Community Driven Development Project aims to enable poor rural communities, improving access to basic infrastructure and services through a people-centered approach and aims to enhance the government’s capacity to respond promptly and effectively to an eligible crisis or emergency. This approach will empower villagers to manage and participate in their own development.

Project Goal: The project will operate in 15 townships to build capacity for good governance, enabling communities to use basic infrastructure and governments to respond to community needs more effectively.
Activities: (1) Assist townships in the planning, implementing, and monitoring of project activities, (2) provide institutional support, capacity development, and technical assistance to the township offices, (3) recruiting and training community facilitators and technical facilitators to assist villagers with the preparation and annual revision of village development plans, (4) help manage project funds in a transparent and accountable manner, (5) prepare engineers and village committees for the preparation and technical design of sub-projects (ie mitigation environmental impacts), (6) ensure wide outreach to local stakeholders, and (7) support grievance handling system.
